source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select 
      [No_],
      [Name],
      replace([Address], ',', '*') as [Address],
      replace([Address 2],',', '*') as [Address 2],
      [Contact],
      [Phone No_],
      [Credit Limit (LCY)],
      [Customer Posting Group],
      [Currency Code],
      [Customer Price Group],
      [Payment Terms Code],
      [Invoice Disc_ Code],
      [Customer Disc_ Group],
      [Collection Method],
      [Payment Method Code],
      [Gen_ Bus_ Posting Group],
      [Post Code],
      [E-Mail],
      [T_I_N_ No_],
      [P_A_N_ No_],
      [Phone No_2],
      [Customer Group Code],
      [Customer Category],
      [Route Code],
      [Customer Type],
      [Executive Code],
      [Customer Subcategory Code],
      [Creation Date Time],
      [Sales Code],
      [Territory],
      [Parent Group],
      [Activate Credit Limit Days],
      [Billing Type],
      [Scheme Applicable],
      [Channel],
      [Sub-Channel 1],
      [Sub-Channel 2],
      [Sub-Channel 3],
      [State Code],
      'AP' as Site_Code
